selected_quotes: Using telemedicine communication to relay biopsy results can mitigate a portion of anxiety assoc'd w cancer dx
Rethinking Patient-Physician Communication of Biopsy Results
Phone may be better than in person for giving biopsy result. I didn't expect that! Discuss.
Patients may prefer hearing biopsy results over phone than in person - time to think about ?s before next appt

citation.title: Rethinking Patient-Physician Communication of Biopsy Results—The Waiting Game

news.title: Giving Bad News by Phone May Be the Better Way
news.summary: Communicating the news that a biopsy result indicates malignancy by telephone may be better than delivering the news in person, a team of researchers from the University of Michigan, in Ann Arbor, suggests.

news.title: Bad news best given over the phone
news.summary: Doctors should consider giving bad news over the phone rather than in person, argue three medical researchers.

facebook.title: Timeline Photos
facebook.summary: This viewpoint argues that patients want pathology results on their biopsies as soon as possible, and that telemedicine may offer the best balance of good but timely patient-physician communication. http://ja.ma/1HvjW6M
